suncertify.gui
Class URLyBirdConfigDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      suncertify.gui.URLyBirdConfigDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class URLyBirdConfigDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

This Class handles the URLyBird Configuration dialog User Interface, manages the components the dialog will contain in respect to the mode the application is running on to fit the Requirement.

Author:
Segun
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

URLyBirdConfigDialog

public URLyBirdConfigDialog(URLyBirdMode m)
This is the initial constructor call of this Object. Other constructors only modifies the configuration during the application use either via the Menu or Configuration button. This constructor determines the components to be rendered in the configuration dialog in respect to the mode of which the application was started i.e Server or Standalone or Client

Parameters:
m - - The URLyBirdMode which is the mode which the application is executed

URLyBirdConfigDialog

public URLyBirdConfigDialog(RemoteURLyBirdServices remote,
                            javax.swing.JFrame parent)
This Constructor is called when the Application (Thread) is running on a Server Mode. Necessary Components required to configure the Remote server are been rendered in the User Interface in respect to the requirement of a Server mode

Parameters:
remote - - RemoteURLyBirdServices Object passing its instance into the Configuration dialog for accessing functions available to access shared resources on the network
parent - - the Parent JComponent for which the Configuration dialog will be displayed on top

URLyBirdConfigDialog

public URLyBirdConfigDialog(LocalURLyBirdServices local,
                            javax.swing.JFrame parent)
This Constructor is called when the Application (Thread) is running on a Standalone (single) Mode. Necessary Components required to configure the User Interface so as to use the application without any Sever connection. the application resources (i.e database file) required are located on the local machine

Parameters:
local - - LocalURLyBirdServices Object passing its instance into the Configuration dialog for accessing functions available to work with the Application required resources on the local system. No Networking required
parent - the Parent JComponent for which the Configuration dialog will be displayed on top

URLyBirdConfigDialog

public URLyBirdConfigDialog(URLyBirdServices service,
                            javax.swing.JFrame parent)
This Constructor is called when the Application (Thread) is running on a Networked (CLIENT) Mode. Necessary Components required to configure the User Interface so as to use the application with any Sever configurations (host address/IP). the application

Parameters:
service - URLyBirdServices Object passing its instance into the Configuration dialog for accessing functions available to work with the Application required resources on the Remote Network using RMI
parent - the Parent JComponent for which the Configuration dialog will be displayed on top
